case.title: First Time Here - 27 (Lnd)
case.text:
thanks for reading
Thought i'd give this ago. Reading some of the ads here there are alot of weirdos. However I'm going to be brave and go for it and of you end up a bunny boiling nut with the desire to bury me alive, I guess I'll have to deal with that. Loool
I'm looking for someone cool to hang out with, go on dates and maybe lead to something serious.
Appearance: I'm 6ft1 with dark hair and green eyes, medium/muscular build with broad shoulders. I'm mediterranean so tall dark and handsome type. Nice smile, smell good.
Personality: I'm down to earth, sensitive yet firm. Easy going, polite, kind, intelligent and witty. Educated, great sense of humour, confident, articulate and rebellious at times.
not going to go into details of the things I'm into as thats something you can find out in conversation.
If any of that interests you get in touch. Would love to hear from you.
